description: Triangle T(n,k) of number of digraphs with a quasi-source on n labeled nodes and with k arcs, k=0,1,..,n*(n-1).
links: V. Jovovic and G. Kilibarda, Enumeration of labeled quasi-initially connected digraphs, Discrete Math., 224 (2000), 151-163.
example: Triangle starts:1;0,2,1;0,0,12,20,15,6,1;0,0,0,104,426,768,920,792,495,220,66,12,1;...Number of digraphs with a quasi-source on 3 labeled nodes is 54=12+20+15+6+1.
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Sep 14 2000
